de.scrubstudios.srvmon.agent.classes

Class XML

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.scrubstudios.srvmon.agent.classes.XML

  • public class XML
extends java.lang.Object
    XML class. This class contains all the necessary functions for the creation and evaluation of XML data from the server. In normal operation, the agent will send XML data to the server which then responds with new XML data. With the received data, we can tell if a query was successful or retrieve new service checks.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Pol Warnimont

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static XML getInstance()
        This method is used in order to determine if there is already an instance of this class. If no instance of this class exists, the constructor will be called. Else the method returns the instance stored in instance.
        Returns:
        An instance of the class itself.

      • getHostID

        public int getHostID(java.lang.String hostname)
        This method is needed to receive an ID number for the current agent host. The method will create a query on the server which then retrieves the ID number for the given hostname. This method is only called once when the agent starts.
        Parameters:
        hostname - Hostname of the agent host.
        Returns:
        The ID number for the given hostname.

      • getServicesFromDirector

        public java.util.ArrayList<Service> getServicesFromDirector(int hostid)
        This method is used to populate an array list containing service checks. Firstly, a new XML message is generated and will be send to the server. If the agent receives an answer from the server, the method will then proceed to add every single service for the host to the array list and return it.
        Parameters:
        hostid - ID of the host which runs the agent.
        Returns:
        An array list of services for the host.

      • updateService

        public void updateService(int hostid,
                 Service service)
        This method updates the service check values on the director server.
        Parameters:
        hostid - ID for this agent host.
        service - Current executed service.

      • getScriptChecksum

        public java.lang.String getScriptChecksum(int hostid,
                                 Service service)
        This method return the checksum for the given script.
        Parameters:
        hostid - ID number of the current Agent host.
        service - Current service.
        Returns:
        The checksum of the given service.
